name: Noodleman.io - Survival Games
description:
Noodleman.io is a fun and popular multiplayer action game. You can battle royal with the real local or online players. Pick up other players and throw them off the area. Meanwhile, take care to protect yourself from being killed. Try to survive and be the last one standing. Release the stress in this crowd city, and you will have a wonderful game time. Win the world's top 1 honor.

Features:
+ Absurd and interesting physics.
+ Softbody character system.
+ Top1 time killer game.
+ Fast match in multiplayer.
+ Compete with real players not bots.
+ Light and amusing background music.
